double-portion.hebrew: וִיהִי נָא פִּי שְׁנַיִם בְּרוּחֲךָ אֵלָי
double-portion.english: Let a double portion of your spirit be upon me

god-of-elijah.english: Where is the LORD, the God of Elijah?

wash-seven-times.english: Go wash seven times in the Jordan

open-his-eyes.context: Prayer for servant to see heavenly army
open-his-eyes.hebrew: יְהוָה פְּקַח נָא אֶת עֵינָיו וְיִרְאֶה
open-his-eyes.english: LORD, open his eyes that he may see

borrow-vessels.english: Borrow vessels... do not get just a few

child-sneezed.english: The child sneezed seven times and opened his eyes

more-with-us.hebrew: כִּי רַבִּים אֲשֶׁר אִתָּנוּ מֵאֲשֶׁר אוֹתָם
more-with-us.english: Those who are with us are more than those who are with them
